summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein from June 1 to June 30, 2017. It includes information on debits, credits, and the ending balance, highlighting various transactions including payroll fees and outgoing transfers to other banks.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein for the month of June 2017.
The ending balance as of June 30, 2017, was $489,038.59.
Multiple outgoing transfers were made to various entities, including Wells Fargo and Bank of America.
There were several preauthorized debits for payroll fees and other payments during the month.
Cynthia Rodriguez is listed as a contact for inquiries related to the account.
